Embrace a peaceful escape in our cozy treehouse, where every morning unveils the beauty of dawn. Here, you'll be cradled by the branches, lulled by nature's symphony, and immersed in tranquility. A stay that takes you into the heart of the forest and connects you with the essence of peace. Nebula Nook Treehouse offers a unique opportunity to awaken your senses, rekindle your spirit, and rediscover the beauty of a sunrise in the wild.am an intuitive reader and a psychic. I can have a discussion on almost any topic. I am a curious bud and really a weird nerd in serious situations. A philosophical thinker with a grounded perspective on life that often leaves you pondering deep questions while laughing uncontrollably. I like to remind everyone that even in the most serious moments, a good laugh can be the best medicine for the soul.Explore Tandi Village in Jibhi: Your Gateway to Serene Adventures Nestled in the lap of the Himalayas, Tandi Village in Jibhi, Himachal Pradesh, is a tranquil haven where nature's wonders await. Surrounded by lush greenery, apple orchards, and pristine landscapes, this village is an idyllic escape for travelers seeking serenity. Nearby Places to Hang Out: Jibhi: Just a stone's throw away, Jibhi offers beautiful mountains, local eateries, and a vibrant local market. Stroll through the village, savor Himachali cuisine, and immerse in its warm hospitality. Sarolsar Lake: A short trek from Tandi Village leads to the pristine Sarolsar Lake, a hidden gem that rewards hikers with breathtaking views and a sense of tranquility. Chehni Kothi: An architectural marvel, Chehni Kothi is a traditional Himachali tower that showcases the region's unique building style. Shringa Rishi Temple: This ancient temple is a spiritual retreat, offering peace and a glimpse into Himachal's rich cultural heritage. Nature Walks: Explore the dense forests, serene rivers, and enchanting landscapes on guided nature walks. Tirthan Valley: A short drive takes you to the serene Tirthan Valley, renowned for its fishing opportunities and serene beauty. Tandi Village is a gateway to a world of natural wonders, warm hospitality, and unforgettable experiences. Whether you seek adventure or peaceful relaxation, this Himalayan gem has it all.Languages spoken: English,HindiArea infoSee availabilityRestaurants1 Restaurant On SiteRyan Ka CafeCuisineChinese  Indian  Italian  Pizza  LocalOpen forBreakfast  Brunch  Lunch  DinnerAmbienceTraditional  RomanticDietary optionsVegetarianAmenities of Nebula Nook TreeHouseSee availabilityMost popular amenitiesFree WiFi Non-smoking rooms Free parking Room service Restaurant Family rooms Breakfast BathroomTowels Bidet Slippers Private Bathroom Toilet Free toiletries Hairdryer Bathtub Shower BedroomLinens ViewMountain view View OutdoorsOutdoor fireplace Outdoor furniture Sun deck Balcony Garden KitchenElectric kettle Food & DrinkBreakfast in the room Restaurant InternetWiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.ParkingFree public parking is available on site (reservation is not needed).ServicesDaily housekeeping Car rental Laundry Additional chargeRoom service Entertainment & Family ServicesBaby safety gates Safety & securityCCTV outside property Key access GeneralHypoallergenic room available Heating Family rooms Non-smoking rooms Languages SpokenEnglish Hindi See availability House rules Nebula Nook TreeHouse takes special requests  add in the next step! We are more than just a hotel; we are a vibrant sanctuary designed for the free-spirited and adventurous souls seeking an extraordinary travel experience. At Peppynomads, we believe that travel is not just about the destination, but about the journey itself. Our vision is to create a space where wanderlust is nurtured, where creativity flourishes, and where connections are forged. Step into our world and be captivated by the enchanting blend of bohemian charm and modern comforts. Each room is thoughtfully designed with unique decor, boasting a fusion of colors, patterns, and textures that reflect the spirit of exploration. Immerse yourself in a visual tapestry that will ignite your imagination and inspire your inner nomad. Our communal spaces are designed to foster a sense of togetherness and camaraderie. Relax and unwind in our lush garden oasis, a tranquil haven where you can find solace amidst nature's beauty. Or gather around the crackling fireplace in our cozy lounge, sharing stories and laughter with fellow adventurers from around the world. But Peppynomads is more than just a physical space; it's a community. Our passionate team of hosts is dedicated to curating exceptional experiences tailored to your unique interests. Whether it's recommending hidden gems in the city, organizing local excursions, or hosting immersive workshops and events, we are here to ensure your journey is filled with wonder and discovery.Property infoPeppy Nomads, the lively and spirited home away from home for the free-spirited and adventurous! Here, we don't just provide a place to stay, but a place to explore, create, and connect. Our passionate team of hosts is here to ensure your journey is filled with wonder and discovery - from recommending hidden gems in the city to organizing local excursions and hosting immersive workshops and events. So, what are you waiting for? Let's get peppy and exploreNeighborhood info Nestled in the serene and untouched beauty of Himachal Pradesh, Jibhi is a hidden gem that welcomes you with its idyllic charm and tranquil landscapes. This quaint village, situated in the Banjar Valley, captivates visitors with its lush greenery, cascading waterfalls, and snow-capped peaks that adorn the horizon. Jibhi offers a peaceful retreat for those seeking solace in nature's embrace. Take leisurely strolls along winding trails, meandering through picturesque apple orchards and dense forests, or simply sit by the riverside, listening to the soothing melody of the flowing water. The ethereal beauty of Jibhi makes it a haven for nature lovers and photographers, providing endless opportunities to capture stunning vistas and cherish unforgettable moments. Immerse yourself in the local culture and hospitality of Jibhi, as the friendly locals warmly welcome you into their world. Engage in conversations, learn about their traditional way of life, and savor the delicious local cuisine that reflects the flavors of Himachal Pradesh. For the adventurous souls, Jibhi serves as a gateway to thrilling activities like trekking, hiking, and camping. Explore nearby trails that lead to hidden waterfalls, pristine lakes, and mesmerizing viewpoints, rewarding you with breathtaking panoramas and a sense of accomplishment. Jibhi is an offbeat destination that offers a respite from the hustle and bustle of city life, allowing you to reconnect with nature, rejuvenate your spirit, and find solace in its tranquil surroundings. Whether you seek serenity, adventure, or a glimpse into the rich cultural heritage of Himachal Pradesh, Jibhi promises an unforgettable experience that will leave you yearning to return again and again.Languages SpokenEnglish,Hindi,Marathi,PunjabiArea infoSee availabilityRestaurants1 Restaurant On SitePeppy Nomads CafeCuisineChinese British Indian LocalOpen forBreakfast Lunch Dinner High teaAmbienceFamily-friendly ModernAmenities of Peppy Nomads LuxuriaGreat facilities! Property practicesThis property told us they've implemented certain practices across some or all of these categories: waste, water, energy and greenhouse gases, destination and community, and nature.Learn moreHosted by Chhabeel KumarChhabeel KumarWelcome to our charming property, nestled in the heart of nature. We offer two exquisite A-frame cottages, each featuring a duplex setup that can comfortably accommodate up to four guests at standard occupancy and up to six at most. What sets our cottages apart are the unique natural elements that enhance your stay. One of our A-frame cottages boasts an enchanting apple tree inside, creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere. The other A-frame cottage features a stunning cedar tree gracefully extending through the balcony, providing a truly unique connection with nature. The highlight of both cottages is the breathtaking view they offer. Each cottage provides guests with panoramic vistas of the Jibhi Valley, the majestic Lambhri Peak, and the iconic Jalori Pass, making it an ideal getaway for nature enthusiasts and adventure seekers. Additionally, you'll have a clear view of the historic Raghupur Fort, which adds a touch of history to your scenic retreat. We look forward to hosting you and sharing the natural wonders of this stunning location.As your host, I bring a unique blend of passion and experiences to ensure your stay is both enjoyable and memorable. When I'm not hosting guests, I channel my enthusiasm into my role as a dedicated farmer and horticulturist. I am the proud owner of an apple orchard, where I cultivate and nurture these exquisite fruits, known for their quality and flavour. My love for the land extends beyond just farming. I'm also an avid experimenter, always seeking innovative ways to improve the orchard and contribute to the art of horticulture. These experiments not only allow me to stay in touch with the land but also foster a deep appreciation for the natural world. Beyond my agricultural pursuits, I'm a part-time traveler. Exploring new destinations and cultures is a source of inspiration for me. My travels have broadened my horizons and deepened my understanding of hospitality, making me even more dedicated to providing you with a wonderful and enriching experience during your stay.Our property is situated in a serene and picturesque small village, with a population of approximately 50 people. The village exudes tranquility, offering an escape from the hustle and bustle of urban life. Here, you can immerse yourself in the peaceful ambiance of a close-knit community, where time seems to slow down. One of the key highlights of the village is the beautiful temple dedicated to Goddess Durga. This sacred place holds significant cultural and spiritual importance for both the villagers and visitors. It's an ideal spot to experience the local traditions and connect with the spiritual essence of the region.Languages spoken: English,HindiArea infoSee availabilityAmenities of winterfell treehouse jibhiSee availabilityMost popular amenitiesFree WiFi Free parking Room service Family rooms Breakfast ParkingFree private parking is available on site (reservation is not needed).Accessible parking InternetWiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.KitchenShared kitchen Cleaning products Kitchen BedroomWalk-in closet BathroomPrivate Bathroom Living AreaSofa Sitting area Room AmenitiesSofa bed Clothes rack Tile/Marble floor Private entrance Interconnecting room(s) available Fan Ironing facilities Iron PetsPets are allowed on request. Here, we don't just provide a place to stay, but a place to explore, create, and connect. Our passionate team of hosts is here to ensure your journey is filled with wonder and discovery - from recommending hidden gems in the city to organizing local excursions and hosting immersive workshops and events. So, what are you waiting for? Let's get peppy and exploreProperty infoWelcome to Peppynomads Apartment in Jibhi, a charming haven nestled amidst the breathtaking landscapes of Himachal Pradesh. Our apartment offers a perfect blend of comfort, style, and tranquility, providing you with a home away from home in this picturesque village. Step into our thoughtfully designed and well-appointed apartment, where rustic elegance meets modern amenities. Immerse yourself in the cozy ambiance, as the natural elements and warm hues create a soothing retreat after a day of exploration. Relax in the comfortable living area, enjoy a cup of tea on the balcony, or unwind in the plush bedrooms that ensure a restful night's sleep. Our apartment is equipped with all the essentials to make your stay seamless and enjoyable. Prepare your own meals in the fully equipped kitchenette, allowing you to savor the local produce and flavors. Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi, and make use of the modern bathroom facilities for your convenience.Neighborhood info Nestled in the serene and untouched beauty of Himachal Pradesh, Jibhi is a hidden gem that welcomes you with its idyllic charm and tranquil landscapes. This quaint village, situated in the Banjar Valley, captivates visitors with its lush greenery, cascading waterfalls, and snow-capped peaks that adorn the horizon. Jibhi offers a peaceful retreat for those seeking solace in nature's embrace. Take leisurely strolls along winding trails, meandering through picturesque apple orchards and dense forests, or simply sit by the riverside, listening to the soothing melody of the flowing water. The ethereal beauty of Jibhi makes it a haven for nature lovers and photographers, providing endless opportunities to capture stunning vistas and cherish unforgettable moments. Immerse yourself in the local culture and hospitality of Jibhi, as the friendly locals warmly welcome you into their world. Engage in conversations, learn about their traditional way of life, and savor the delicious local cuisine that reflects the flavors of Himachal Pradesh. For the adventurous souls, Jibhi serves as a gateway to thrilling activities like trekking, hiking, and camping. Explore nearby trails that lead to hidden waterfalls, pristine lakes, and mesmerizing viewpoints, rewarding you with breathtaking panoramas and a sense of accomplishment. Jibhi is an offbeat destination that offers a respite from the hustle and bustle of city life, allowing you to reconnect with nature, rejuvenate your spirit, and find solace in its tranquil surroundings. Whether you seek serenity, adventure, or a glimpse into the rich cultural heritage of Himachal Pradesh, Jibhi promises an unforgettable experience that will leave you yearning to return again and again.Languages SpokenEnglish,Hindi,PunjabiArea infoSee availabilityAmenities of Peppy Nomads ApartmentSee availabilityMost popular amenitiesFree WiFi Free parking Airport shuttle Family rooms BathroomToilet paper Towels Bidet Private Bathroom Toilet BedroomLinens Extra long beds (> 6.5 ft) ViewRiver view City view Mountain view Garden view View OutdoorsOutdoor fireplace Picnic area Outdoor furniture Terrace Balcony Garden KitchenToaster Stovetop Oven Kitchenware Kitchen Microwave Kitchenette Room AmenitiesSocket near the bed Sofa bed PetsPets are allowed. It will be replaced by a Booking.com review score once this property receives its first review from guests on our site.Hosted by kaveti vineethkaveti vineethThis Earthen home is nestled amidst the grandeur of the mountains, perched atop a mountain within a dense deodar forest offering a panoramic view of the foothills of Pir Panjal ranges,With a beautiful landscape that changes with every passing season. The entire structure,excluding the kitchen and bathroom,is a true earthen building crafted from natural materials sourced locally. It is a fusion of traditional Himachali Kathkuni and Nordic architecture,that mirrors our influences & aspirations. This cottage is built by a close-knit group of school-time friends who fell in love with the mountains and the Himalayan Odyssey. Constructing an earthen cottage in this remote location, without direct road access, posed significant challenges. everything single thing that you can see in the cottage including the stones and wood has been physically carried down to this spot. a lot of people including dear villagers, ourselves, and our friends who visited us, have worked very hard, labored harder, and selflessly contributed whatever they could to make it possible to bring this dream to life over two and a half years. as you explore the property you shall find a lot of imperfections in the cottage they are not flaws and they are left deliberately by us to symbolize the authenticity and the work we have put into it and reflect how hard we tried. Our main purpose is to give you all an unparalleled experience of staying at a place and a home like this. we hope you all embrace the cottage in the way it is meant to be and love it. This cottage is the right place for you if... You love to be amongst nature, wilderness and love exploring..You enjoy being outdoors, seek adventure and the tranquility of rural life.You want to experience slow and conscious living.You want to spend some peaceful time in the lap of the mountains. Artists, writers, climbers, adventure athletes, mountaineers, trail runners, dirtbike/off-road enthusiasts, bird watchers,and photographers are most welcome.professional mountaineer, rock climber, backpacking india, motorhead, biryani chef. Our Adored caretakers, Pooja Didi, and Hemu Bhai, will be available to assist with anything you may need. We'll share their contact details once you've confirmed your booking. Rest assured, they are there to make your stay enjoyable and hassle-free.Our neighborhood embodies the essence of a quaint traditional Himachali village surrounded by a dense deodar forest, where the residents are primarily farmers and cattle grazers. The atmosphere exudes a vintage rural charm, enveloping us in the warmth of a close-knit community. Being rooted in the heart of India's mountainous region, this village is still unexplored and untouched by mainstream tourism. Their lives are intertwined with the natural rhythms of the land, with days stretching out in a leisurely and unhurried manner. The pace of life here is refreshingly slow, allowing us to appreciate the simple pleasures and savor the moments of tranquility that abound in this idyllic setting. *Getting around* Although the distance is less (around 9-10km). It takes around 45min to 1hr from Jibhi main town to reach our property. It involves a 30min drive on 'Jibhi to Bahu Road' and then 15 minutes off-roading from a point called 'zero point' ( just 2km before reaching bahu), followed by a 15 to 20-minute trek through the village and forest. The trek down to the cottage introduces you to the traditional Himachali village ambiance, offering glimpses of local livelihoods and encounters with rare wild birds and flora.Languages spoken: English,HindiArea infoSee availabilityAmenities of The Pahadi Earthen home JIBHISee availabilityMost popular amenitiesFree parking ParkingFree public parking is available at a location nearby (reservation is not needed).InternetNo internet access available.KitchenStovetop Kitchen BathroomBathtub or shower Private Bathroom Living AreaSitting area Desk Room AmenitiesClothes rack Private entrance PetsPets are allowed. Hosted by B S RanaB S RanaAt our homestay, we pride ourselves on providing a genuinely primitive and authentic experience, with sustainability and responsible living at its very heart. Our cottages are intentionally designed in a basic style, offering you the chance to immerse yourself in the essence of true village life. Nestled within our idyllic farm, you'll find yourself enveloped by the tranquil beauty of nature and the captivating allure of rural living. However, our farmstay is not just about offering a mere glimpse into farm life; it's an invitation to actively engage with our vibrant local community. You can take leisurely walks through our lush fruit orchards and bountiful vegetable gardens, savoring the literal fruits of our labor, and relishing the simple pleasures of a countryside existence. Here, you have the opportunity to disconnect from the fast-paced world and rediscover your connection with the natural environment, all while immersing yourself in authentic local experiences. It's a place where you can truly unwind, recharge, and create lasting memories.Rana ji is not just a retired army officer; he is a man deeply connected to his roots and his village. He possesses a profound love for his homeland, which he considers to be his greatest teacher. His affinity for nature is evident in the way he tends to his organic farm and orchard with care and dedication. His commitment to preserving the cultural heritage of his community is truly admirable, making him a respected figure in the village.In essence, Rana ji embodies the spirit of a true steward of both nature and tradition, making a lasting impact on his village through his knowledge, love, and dedication. ChatGPT In addition to his other remarkable qualities, Rana ji holds the distinction of being a pioneer in Jibhi's tourism industry. Back in 1992, he took the bold initiative of establishing Jibhi's very first homestay. This visionary move not only provided visitors with an authentic and immersive experience but also laid the foundation for tourism growth in the region.Jibhi is a charming and picturesque hamlet nestled amidst lush, dense forests. What truly sets this place apart, aside from its natural beauty, is the warm and welcoming nature of its residents. The locals in Jibhi are known for their incredible kindness and willingness to help visitors. They embody a genuine down-to-earth spirit, reflecting their deep-rooted connection to their village. Respect for their village is a core value among the people of Jibhi. They take immense pride in their homeland, and this reverence is reflected in the way they care for their environment and preserve their cultural heritage. Their love for Jibhi shines through in their daily lives, making it a truly special place for anyone fortunate enough to experience its beauty and the genuine hospitality of its residents.Language spoken: EnglishArea infoSee availabilityAmenities of Rana Swiss cottagesSee availabilityMost popular amenitiesFree WiFi Free parking Breakfast ParkingFree private parking is available on site (reservation is not needed).InternetWiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.KitchenKitchen Kitchenette BathroomPrivate Bathroom PetsPets are allowed. This unique home, which has 4 rooms in total with incredible sweetness, is doing its best to make your trip to Jibhi immortal with our guest relations service and tailor made approach towards each guest. It is an untouched living paradise with lush pine, cedar forest and serene panorama. This place has a lot to offer. It is truly a walkers delight and an adventurers amuse. This valley is perfect place for adventure activities like river crossing, Angling, Trekking, Trout-fishing, forest hikes, and lakeside picnics. Orange Sky HOMESTAY offers luxurious spacious super-hygienic rooms with a fully-equipped shared modern kitchen amidst the divine green valley of Gada Gushaini. The best kept secret of Himachal is Tirthan Valley. The best kept secret of Tirthan Valley is Gada Gushaini. The word Gada means a water stream, a valley brook. The word Gushaini means godliness, divinity. Gada Gushaini means a stream of serenity.Mr . Khemraj rana ,the Owner/Host and a greattt Chef has amazing stories to share from his long Hosting experiences in Himachal, Leh and Goa. Amazing, right? So how can you visit Orange sky HOMESTAY? 1) Via Mandi-Aut-Banjar-Jibhi; 12 kms ahead and upwards from Jibhi till Gada Gushaini (Bus/Car/Bike) 2) Via Shimla through NH5 to Luhri- Nagaan-Chhatri-Chhachhgalu-Gadagushaini (Bus/Car/Bike) 3) 65 kms from Kullu-Manali Bhuntar Airport; 180kms from Shimla AirportIf you wish to just walk barefoot or lie down in the fresh green grass, we have a riverside meadow fashioned for yoga, sun and skin therapy, bonfire under starry nights, meals along the gushing of river, art and craft setup or just a scenic luxury workstation. Feel free to use the kitchen in Orange Sky HOMESTAY to try your luck in cooking. When I arrived at the location, I was in awe of the place and the views it commands from the terrace. With premium rooms and amazing food, LTE is situated at the prime location - neither up the hills nor too down. I used to wake up every morning with amazing views of the valley from my room window. The trust she shared with us throughout our stay is something I will remember. She made sure we had everything we needed and made our stay really fun and memorable. The fine printMust-know information for guests at this propertySee availabilityIn case the traveler arrives earlier than the check-in time, the guest can hang out in the common area/cafe until check-in time. (However, if the guests are arriving as early as 5:30-6 AM, it is highly recommended to book a bed for the previous night to ensure a good night's sleep).In order to keep our accommodations costs as affordable as possible for all guests, we have adopted a pay-as-you-go system for certain amenities, such as locks, bath kits, and towels. By offering these items on a chargeable basis, we can maintain lower base prices for our rooms, making our hostel accessible to budget-conscious travelers. We understand that different travelers have different preferences and requirements, so we aim to provide flexibility in our offerings.We cannot guarantee accommodations in the same dorm room. Allocation of a room in a specific private room category may vary depending on availability until the time of check-in.Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.Please inform The Hosteller Shoja, Jibhi of your expected arrival time in advance. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly using the contact details in your confirmation.Payment before arrival by bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
